description:
Free Registry Cleaning And Optimization Utility

The system registry is one of the most important components of the operating system. The stability of the system's operation depends upon it being in working order, and the speed of the applications you work with depends upon the volume of data contained in it.
Registry Life helps correct errors in the registry and optimizes it. It's a compact, simple to use, and FREE solution for servicing your system registry.
- The registry optimization was removed from the interface by
  default as an obsolete function. If you want to enable it, click
  SETTINGS at the bottom of the main window, in the appeared window
  go to the "Obsolete Tools" section and enable the option "Enable the
  Registry Optimization tool".
